entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A few flurries. High plus 5.
